official_title: A bill to amend the manufacturing clause of the copyright law.

summary.text: Amends the copyright law to extend through July 1, 1985, the requirement that imported nondramatic literary works in English be manufactured in North America.

titles.title: A bill to amend the manufacturing clause of the copyright law.
